titles.title: The Holy Ghost Shall Overshadow Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Draw me, I would run after Thee (x2)
Until the day break and the shadows flee away
On the mountains of Bether, I would run after Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And the Holy Ghost shall overshadow thee (x2)
And that holy thing that shall be born of thee
Shall be called the Son of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Be it unto me according to Thy will (x2)
I will abide under the shadow of the Almighty,
Be it unto me according to Thy will.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And my soul doth magnify the Lord (x2)
And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour
And my soul doth magnify the Lord.
